asset.author: skisdotcom
asset.hookText:
http://www.skis.com/Volkl-RTM-77-Skis-with-Marker-4-Motion-11.0-Bindings-2015/362415P,default,pd.html

The RTM 77 from Volkl is back again this season as a fantastic ski for intermediate to advanced skiers that is looking for a stable ski at medium speeds that enjoys making short to medium radius turns. The RTM 77 is made with Volkl's Dual Wood Core that has parallel strips of wood that are surrounded by PU that has a stiff feeling, and the PU adds some dampening properties to give you a smooth skiing ski. The XTD Transmission Construction has some reinforcement over the edges of the skis to still give you power transmission, and flex to the body of the ski. A layer of steel above the Dual wood core increases the torsional power that makes the RTM 77 a great ski for the heavier or more aggressive skier. A Full Rocker profile gives you quick turn initiation, and solid grip as you make your carves down the groomers. If you are looking for a ski that will be stable on the firm snow, and quick to turn on the groomers, the Volkl RTM 77 will be a fantastic choice.
